title: What We Long Forâ€”Connection
itunes:author: Guests: Greg & Erin Smalley
itunes:summary:
Sadly, many married couples report feeling lonely. Sometimes, it might even take a third-party to help you reconnect. John and Greg share how counseling can help you bridge a gap of loneliness between you and your spouse. Featuring Dr. Greg and Erin Smalley.

Find us online at focusonthefamily.com/marriagepodcast or call 1-800-A-FAMILY.

Receive Greg and Erin's book "Reconnected: Moving from Roommates to Soulmates in Your Marriage" for your donation of any amount: https://donate.focusonthefamily.com/don-fofm-podcast-2022-03-22?refcd=1410602

Get more episode resources: https://www.focusonthefamily.com/episodes/focus-on-marriage-podcast/what-we-long-for-connection/#featured-resource-cta

Listen Anytime: https://store.focusonthefamily.com/sharing-the-load-with-your-spouse-digital-download/?refcd=1410602

If you've listened to any of our podcasts, please give us your feedback: https://focusonthefamily.com/podcastsurvey/
